item.title: Ice-T Defends Gun Rights: "The Last Form Of Defense Against Tyranny" | RealClearPolitics
item.description: Ice-T Defends Gun Rights: "The Last Form Of Defense Against Tyranny": MEDIAITE: Speaking with Channel 4 London's... http://t.co/qXmenTdX
item.content:encoded: Ice-T Defends Gun Rights: "The Last Form Of Defense Against Tyranny": MEDIAITE: Speaking with Channel 4 London's... http://t.co/qXmenTdX MEDIAITE: Speaking with Channel 4 Londonâ��s Krishnan Guru-Murthy in the hours after the Colorado news broke, the self-described â��Godfather of Gangsta Rapâ�� vehemently denied a connection between gun rights and the Aurora murders. â��Itâ��s legal in the United States,â�� the rapper said. â��The right to bear arms is because thatâ��s the last form of defense against tyranny. Not to hunt. Itâ��s to protect yourself from the police.â�� â��And do you see any link between that and this sort of instance?â�� Guru-Murthy challenged. â��No. Not really,â�� Ice-T responded. â��If somebody wants to kill people, they donâ��t need a gun to do it.â�� â��Makes it easier though, doesnâ��t it?â�� the host pushed back. â��Not really. You can strap explosives on your body. They do that all the time.â�� Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: realclearpolitics.com
